snippet: A protest of the use of solitary confinement had dwindled to about 100 prisoners after an early peak of 30,000.
abstract: Inmates at California state prisons end two-month hunger strike protesting use of solitary confinement, which had dwindled to about 100 prisoners after early peak of 30,000.
lead_paragraph: A protest of the use of solitary confinement had dwindled to about 100 prisoners after an early peak of 30,000.

headline.main: Inmates End Hunger Strike in California
headline.print_headline: Inmates End Hunger Strike In California
